summary: Like the title says, apocalypse is starting, but as the mod is still a WIP it is not quite finished yet
descriptionHtml:
"Anise, My Sister,

Soon we will be ready, soon we will take over the holds and apocalypse will truly be upon us!"
Anise's sister and her friend Bella have finally reached Anise's Cabin, and have made portals into each of the main hold capitals, they plan to summon an army of undead and then "Apocalypse will truly be upon us" Still A WIP so the portals are done and in the cellar of Anise's Cabin, to use them, you need to kill Anise and take the "Key To The World" She also has a letter from her sister Helgi that explains it all
Plans:Have undead in all of the main 5 cities. For the Dovahkiin to kill
Have a mini quest to kill Helgi And Bella To end apocalypse.


COMPATIBLE WITH OPEN CITIES - SKYRIM.
<br /><br />
author: TiNyTeRRoR180
